page.title: 17SOUTHEND GRAMMAR SCH (BOYS)
page.content: Founded 1895 as Technical sch. with site on edge CBD.Moved to new site 1m north 1939.1939-43 evac to Mansfld. 4 form entry selective grammar.824 pupils incl 200 in 6th.43 staff.Av. 7.3 O levels 2.6 A levs.4-5 schols to Oxbridge a yr.12ac site with 6 ftball -hockey pitches.Exc sports record e.g. 1984/85 won all Borough athletics cups Most pop A lev subjts Maths >100 Phys 90 Geog 80 Econ 70.Since 1980 Girls can join 6th -only 4/5 a yr do!Sch still insists on uniform even in 6th - green blazers and house ties.House system for all sports -4 houses e.g. Troy,Athens etc.Classics still taught. Prefect system run by upr 6th.2 D.Hds and Head of Yr system for pastoral. Home of Southend Boys Choir.1985 final ist in Brit Technology comp.
